extendedInfo.description: Weather+Weather+ is setting a new standard for Weather applications! Top 100 worldwide on the Apple iPad & iPhone.- New York Times: "The most useful Weather App!" - Apple: App Store Essentials - Apps Starter Kit - The Daily: Featured in The Daily App - TUAW.com: Weather+ for your forecasting pleasure "You would be well advised to download Weather+. This app puts all your vital weather information on one page, and the background video matches the weather conditions." (App Smart, NYTimes.com) FULL SCREEN VIDEO:Weather+ gives you current weather conditions and a 5-day forecast of all worldwide weather stations. The information is visualized with beautiful full screen video loops for all conditions. This combined with a Flip Clock and a World Clock upgrades your ipad to a weather station like you never imagined.UNIVERSAL APPLICATION:Fully functional on all Android devices!FEATURES:Weather+ includes a wide range of professional features.â Weather and time details for an unlimited number of cities.â Full screen video loops of the weather in the selected location.â Fully functional on all Android devices and resolutions!â Standard weather info like condition description and temperature.â Wind direction and speed details.â Humidity, precipiation, pressure and visibility details.â 3-hourly weather forecast for a total of 5 days.â Swipe the screen from left to right to switch between selected locations.â Flip clock with World Clock time of your current location and of the selected location.â Switch between Fahrenheit/Miles and Celsius/KilometersWIDGET LAYOUT:You also can change the arrangements of the widgets manually:â Show clock, daily & hourly forecastâ Show clock & daily forecastâ Show clock onlyâ Show one minimal widget at the bottomâ No widgets, text onlyWeather+ is designed to be your daily companion for your basic weather condition needs and will drastically improve your connection to nature and its elements.

reviews.title: How to get rid of
reviews.comment: I am wondering how I can remove the annoying adds off this app. Can anyone help me? Please!
reviews.author: Paul Devita

reviews.title: Good app normally
reviews.comment: This app is good. However, I had to uninstall and reinstall it after a system update and now it keeps saying insufficent storage despite the fact ive got gb\'s of space. Dunno whata going on...
reviews.author: Katy Kearley

reviews.title: I have a galaxy II and it works on my phone.
reviews.comment: I love it. Just wish it would flip....
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Good quality app
reviews.comment: Brilliant if you want weather updates on the go.
reviews.author: Karen Hart

reviews.title: Weather huh
reviews.comment: Won\'t even let me install it & I\'ve got loads of room on my phone! Poor!!
reviews.author: Vera Marsh

reviews.title: Moto
reviews.comment: Need to fix the location of the numbers of the clock so they fit to the transparent box
reviews.author: Joshua Slivicke

reviews.title: Almost always spot on!
reviews.comment: Its been wrong a few times, but consistently more accurate than the weather channel app!
reviews.author: Alaina Beeman

reviews.title: Clock
reviews.comment: Nice. Needs to be added more skins for clock and maybe from 15 minutes not just from hour weather forecast updates, maybe manual refreshing weather. Flip clock doesn\'t work, please don\'t show me in the summer snow.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: So close to being perfect
reviews.comment: How do you remove the leading zero from the time?
reviews.author: Nathan Meyer

reviews.title: Excellent
reviews.comment: Very nice app
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: NOT UPDATING! ... Or updates too infrequently!
reviews.comment: I set update interval to every hour. I have stored many cities in this app and after waiting around 4 hours now! The weather for my local city and the next few cities still shows last updated Nov. 24, two days ago!!! I contacted the developers in DECEMBER 2012 and never heard from them! . The fact that the last app update was in May 2012 proves that either the company does not care to fix this app and add other features to it, that they are in financial trouble or have already CEASED OPERATIONS!
reviews.author: Can Agbaba

reviews.title: Great app
reviews.comment: This app is great ... it all works except for the hourly widget which is stuck in the 24 hour format. Not an issue but it would be nice to use the 12 hour format instead.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Not updating
reviews.comment: This app looks good liked it on the Apple products so was happy to see it on Play Store but it hasn\'t been updating the weather just been saying mostly sunny when iv had rain please fix.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: GPS
reviews.comment: Does not have all the towns you would think, I live in Morrinsville, New Zealand and its not in the list, but two of the next towns are, like Waitoa and Tahuna which are three times smaller than mine as we are the main town of both of them. Also when changing the name if a town it does not stay like that forever, as it reads the coordinates. Please fix even Google Map has our town.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Problems+
reviews.comment: Won\'t update... uninstalled, re-installed...will not update, will not add locations, then requires FC. Very large install for nothing...so, thanks for nothing!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Good app but can\'t launch clock
reviews.comment: Expected it to launch clock /alarm app when clicking on time section.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Weather+
reviews.comment: Great app.  Spend the 99 cents and see the weather in all the cities you enter. It\'s easy and you have an easy reference of weather where friends and family are living . Worth the 99 cents.
reviews.author: Agave Don

reviews.title: How about that weather?
reviews.comment: Looks great, easy and informative. If it made coffee in the morning I would give it 5 stars. Well done.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Weather not updating..!!
reviews.comment: Showing same weather since last 18 hours!! Switching back to HD Widgets... what a waste of money!!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Broken landscape mode.
reviews.comment: Time can take a while to update\' can\'t handle landscape modes
reviews.author: A Google User
